column4: hi guys can somebody tell me how to make keyboards shortcuts for arbitrary commands ?
I think it should be possible using compiz
install compizconfig-settings-manager
exactly that I found on internet but what package should I instal?
compizconfig-settings-manager is the package
I have it allready on newest vewrsion :) but how can I start it or find it
system -> preferences -> desktop effects
or maybe "advanced desktop effects" ... itll have a green jewel icon
did you get it open? if youre having trouble, just hit alt+f2 and type "ccsm" in the runbox
its in general
there's a "keybindings" tab inside it
bzhang: ok thanks very much :) it's working now
also, itd probably help if you actually described what was wrong
youre still not describing a specific problem which you would like help resolving. please do so.
there is no guarantee that 64bit will fix any of your bugs
by the way, 64bit software requires more memory, so unless youve got 4GiB, your system will likely actually suffer WORSE performance with amd64
the work offline thing...are you using network manager or not?
Yes i have UbuDSL for config my network
well thats why on firefox then. it asks networkmanager "am i online?" if youre not using nm, nm cant answer that quesiton
i dont know. i dont use proprietary graphics.
s*it ;/
no swaring
